Name: Clip maker
About the game: The Clip maker is a very cool tool bundle Using its cool functionality you can make any digital content like: 4K 360 degree video, up to 8K video clips, movies, animation, image art, visual novels, stories, manga, comics, wallpapers or just have a fun creating scenes and making characters behave as you would like. Also you can use your own content: game objects for creating scenes and vRoid, MMD (MikuMikuDance), DAZ3D, CC and Poser characters! Content Basic game includes the following content: ☑ 13 characters ☑ 1385 animations ☑ 92 poses ☑ 13 scenes ☑ 166 prefabs for Scene builder ☑ 82 melee and shooting weapon ☑ 598 VFX The Clip maker is fully integrated with VRoid, MMD (MikuMikuDance), DAZ3D, Character Creator and Poser. You can upload your own models or use thousands of models created by other developers. Also you can upload your own FBX files (characters, props, etc...), images, videos and audios and use them for creating unique content. Two additional free DLC include the following content: ☑ 4550 prefabs for Scene builder ☑ 5386 animations How to use Everything is managed through a simple interface, each functions is fully explained in dozens of video manuals / with subtitles translated to your language. It is very easy to use for all creative minds. The Clip maker offers you save and load system of timeline, so you can prepare your clip and record it later or can easily edit the timeline you have made earlier. Timeline features ☑ full camera position management ☑ linear mode ☑ arc mode ☑ bounce mode ☑ acceleration time ☑ time scale (slow down and speed up time) ☑ billboards with images and videos ☑ background audio ☑ text blocks ☑ light equipment ☑ visual effects ☑ scene builder ☑ directional light changer ☑ HDRI sky changer Character features ☑ animation changer, ☑ pose changer, ☑ animated eyes changer, ☑ look at target changer, ☑ emotions changer, ☑ wardrobe changer, ☑ makeup changer, ☑ eyes changer, ☑ human pose changer, ☑ pose editor, ☑ hair changer, ☑ color changer for body and wardrobe ☑ talk system, ☑ keep in hand system Modules features ☑ scene settings ☑ scene builder ☑ water system ☑ green screen chroma key system ☑ physical camera control ☑ crop image ☑ mp4 and mp3 mergers ☑ mp4 and mp3 cutters ☑ mp4 to mp3 converter ☑ YouTube downloader ☑ vRoid loader ☑ MMD (MikuMikuDance) loader ☑ FBX loader ☑ YouTube, Twitch and Facebook real time streaming ☑ voice recorder ☑ web camera and microphone Output formats ☑ H264 ☑ GIF ☑ H264 NVIDIA ☑ H264 Lossless 420 ☑ H264 Lossless 444 ☑ Hevc Default ☑ Hevc NVIDIA ☑ ProRes422 ☑ ProRes444 ☑ VP8 default ☑ VP9 default ☑ HAP ☑ HAP alpha ☑ HAPQ ☑ PNG images ☑ Transparent PNG images ☑ Green screen video I am constantly working on improving game functions and adding new content on the users' request! All content you make belongs to you without any limits The Clip maker is a very cool game which may turn you into a famous blogger, vlogger, screenwriter and producer! You can post the video clip and art content you made on thousands of web sites like YouTube, Instagram or TikTok.
